name: @scwar/nestjs-seeker
description: A comprehensive NestJS search package with intelligent local/cloud indexing and search capabilities

scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run changelog:update
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run changelog:update
scripts.version:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run changelog:update
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && npm run build && npm run test && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")"
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && npm run build && npm run test && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")"
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && npm run build && npm run test && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")"
scripts.release:auto: npm run version:auto && npm run build && npm run test && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test

author: Favour Max-Oti
